pullRequest.title: Move MetricData and add labels to the points
pullRequest.bodyText:
The reason to move in data package is to avoid package circular dependencies, example if we move Aggregator to a aggregators package then:
aggregators depends on the metrics package for the MetricData.
metrics depends on the aggregators to use the Aggregator interface.
Split from #831

commit.message:
Move MetricData and add labels to the points

Signed-off-by: Bogdan Cristian Drutu <bogdandrutu@gmail.com>

nodes.bodyText: This is a good change. Glad to see it.

Only one type of points are available at any moment for a {@link MetricData}. + *

Only one type of points are available at any moment for a {@link MetricData}, and the type + * is determined by the {@link Descriptor.Type}. * * @return the data {@link Point}s for this metric, or {@code null} if this type of points are not * accepted. * @since 0.3.0 */ - @Nullable - public abstract Collection getLongPoints(); + public abstract Collection getPoints();
